item.title: [PI] changeing name of a potion
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

i need to add overloads i already have thne just need to change the name this is what i have so far

break;
case 151: //id of item
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Drink”;
itemDef.modelID = 51845;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2256;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 456;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 513;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.aByte154 = -14;
itemDef.anInt165 = ; //male wield model
itemDef.anInt200 = ; //femArmModel
itemDef.name = “Overload Potion (3)”;
itemDef.description = “It’s A Overload Potion With 3 Doses Left.”.getBytes();//examine.

need the rest i laready have the id number but need the models and stuff how can i find??
